name: liverpudlian

a person from Liverpool, a city in northwest England

from or relating to Liverpool, a city in northwest England: He speaks with a thick Liverpudlian accent. She had that down-to-earth Liverpudlian wit.
More examplesFewer examplesThe Liverpudlian artist is among the nominees for the prize.I've got a working class Liverpudlian background.He's proud of being Liverpudlian.
